sense.name: procreate, multiply
sense.examples: Rabbits reproduced faster that farmers could kill them with pitchforks. When the animal reproduced, the DNA would be transmitted to some fraction of its progeny.

sense.name: make a copy, recreate, repeat
sense.examples: He reproduced the works of the Dutch masters, in particular the portraits of Rubens, Hals, Van Dyke, and his master Soutman. On May 30, he reproduced and posted on his blog a Xinhua news story. He reproduced the antique vestiges of powerful Rome and was one of the most authoritative archeologists of his time. In 2005 he reproduced and expanded the collection.
